item.title:
Football players can tackle, get up, kick and chase a ball in one seamless motion. How could robots master these motor skills? ⚽
We trained AI agents to demonstrate these agile behaviours using end-to-end reinforcement learning.
Find out more: https://t.co/LkYtaMeUEd https://t.co/23LE1z0hAX

item.title:
The World Day for Safety and Health at Work aims to prevent occupational accidents and diseases.
For example, night shifts disrupt sleep cycles, affecting health. Johanna Meijer @LUMC_Leiden investigates causes like biological clocks and light cues.
